ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ kéen ńgÿo, atÿǒsoŋ cʉ́ʼʉ tsẅɛʼɛ́ metǒon.
en: For you have turned the city into a pile of rocks,

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, aláʼ gie á gẅiin ngʉ̀ʼ,
en: Therefore, a strong people will honor you.
For you have been a stronghold for the poor person,
like heat in a dry land,

ngiemboon: À ge gÿo tyé ndùm lekwɛ́ sɔɔn ŋwɛ́,
À ge gÿo legwé le gíŋe ńdáʼ ńgwɔ́ wó wɔ́.
en: When he has swallowed up death once and for all,

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, mé gɔɔn ngie:
en: On that day it will be said,
For the Lord’s power will rest on this mountain.
He will spread out his arms in the middle of it,

ngiemboon: Gù Mowab, ńgʉa na metʉ̂ankáʼ mie
en: The high-walled fortress will be brought down,
